wikitext.*:
'''''kundo''''' is a [[Quenya]] word for "guardian".<ref>{{PM|Ai}}, p. 260</ref>

[[Helge Fauskanger]] has suggested that Tolkien's manuscript note "''cundo'' 'lord'"<ref name=PE17>{{PE|17}}, p. 117</ref> is a related gloss, also in [[Quenya]]. The latter form conforms to the orthography used in ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' (where Tolkien represented the [k]-sound with the letter "c").<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Helge Fauskanger]]|articleurl=http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/quen-eng.htm|articlename=Quettaparma Quenyallo|dated=25 December 2008|website=Arda|accessed=11 March 2014}}</ref>

==Examples==
* ''[[Karma-kundo]]'' "Helm-guardian"
